entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lynn Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lynn Lake Airport 07:01 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.7°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
